name: Collapsible Panel
description: The Collapsible Panel component displays summary information and upon selecting the panel, it expands to display the full expansion panel.

properties.name: title
properties.label: Title
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the title of the panel.

eventHandlers.name: onExpand
eventHandlers.label: On Expand Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the user opens the panel section.

eventHandlers.name: onCollapse
eventHandlers.label: On Collapse Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the user closes the panel section.
